description: It is the second Hollywood blockbuster to be released since March, but most cinemas can't show it.
title: Wonder Woman 1984: Film sequel opens to a quarter of UK cinemas
title_page: Wonder Woman 1984: Film sequel opens to a quarter of UK cinemas - BBC News
maintext: She concluded: "We may discover all kinds of new and interesting things for different projects but I do very much believe in the right films going just to theatres and having fans see it the way you made the film to be seen first."
